techmeme.title: On X, Paul Graham says claims about YC firing Sam Altman are "not true", and Altman left because he wanted to work full-time on OpenAI as its CEO (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
Google rolls out new features to Android, including editing sent messages in Google Messages, improvements to instant hotspot, a Google Home widget, and more (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
Auction house Christie's alerts the FBI and UK police about the hack that hobbled its website earlier this month, and begins telling clients of compromised data (Zachary Small/New York Times)
Elon Musk agrees to testify in the SEC's probe of his 2022 Twitter acquisition, after dropping his plan to appeal a court order that he comply with a subpoena (Jef Feeley/Bloomberg)
Filing: Terraform Labs and founder Do Kwon reach a tentative settlement with the US SEC in its case alleging they misled investors before TerraUSD's collapse (Jody Godoy/Reuters)
